WRKSTAT.title: WRKSTAT
WRKSTAT.description: Last week were you working full time, part time, going to school, keeping house, or what? Please provide one response only. If you were doing more than one of these last week, select the one closest to the top of the list.
enumDescriptions: With a job, but not at work because of temporary illness, vacation,
Unemployed, laid off, looking for work
